resources.string: WLAN will automatically download this file
Not enough space on internal download storage
Not enough space on external storage
Allows the app to view and modify all downloads initiated by any app on the system.
"Allows the app to download files to the download cache, which can't be automatically deleted when the download manager needs more space."
Allows the app to send notifications about completed downloads. Malicious apps can use this to confuse other apps that download files.
Allows the app to access the download manager and to use it to download files. Malicious apps can use this to disrupt downloads and access private information.
"Allows the app to access the download manager's advanced functions. Malicious apps can use this to disrupt downloads and access private information."
Allows the app to download files through the download manager without any notification being shown to the user.
Allows the app to see all downloads to the SD card, regardless of which app downloaded them.
Reserve space in the download cache
See all downloads to USB storage

"Use Xunlei Accelerator to speed up downloads? The URL of the download's host will uploaded to Xunlei's servers. Your Mi Account details will also be uploaded to check if you have any active subscriptions to this service."

"You're no longer connected to WLAN. Using your mobile data connection to complete this download will increase your data usage. If you go over your plan’s data limit, your carrier could charge you additional fees."

"Starting this %s download now may result in excessive usage of your mobile data connection, which can lead to charges by your mobile operator depending on your data plan.
Touch %s to start this download the next time you're connected to a WLAN network."

"You must use WLAN to complete this %s download.
Touch %s to start this download the next time you're connected to a WLAN network."
Download too large for operator network
